arguments.name: Average_range
arguments.description: One or more cells to average, including numbers or names, arrays, or references that contain numbers.

arguments.name: Criteria_range1, criteria_range2, â€¦
arguments.description: Criteria_range1 is required, subsequent criteria_ranges are optional. 1 to 127 ranges in which to evaluate the associated criteria.

arguments.name: Criteria1, criteria2, ...
arguments.description: Criteria1 is required, subsequent criteria are optional. 1 to 127 criteria in the form of a number, expression, cell reference, or text that define which cells will be averaged. For example, criteria can be expressed as 32, "32", ">32", "apples", or B4.
